item.title: Setting up a database for my Jarvis
item.description: Setting up a database for my Jarvis As I run more sophiscated trading strategies, I require a proper database for training parameters and records. Previously, I was using a mix of SQLite, RDA and CSV files - but going forward I will be using Mysql (workbench) to house my data. Below is an example of database tables for my market neutral strategies. I will be using these tables for the following,
